page.title: 11Gardening in Brockhampton
page.content: We have half an acre of land half of that is garden.Through the middle of the garden we have a hedge which we use as a wind break.We grow in our garden the following crops which our family of five eat. Parsnips Potatoes, Frenchbean, leeks, Carrots, Runnerbean, Tomatoes, Onions, Beetroot, We also have a fruit garden in which we have.. Raspberry, Goseberry, Blackcurrant, Stawberry, red currant, Chinese wine berry, Tay berry &Damson. In the polythene tunnel we keep tomatoes and we sometimes show these. In the small green house we grow pot plants mostly Fuchsias,Begonias & Geraniums.In the large green house we keep onions and grapes.
